title: Xmas Cookie Clicker

thumbnailDetails.alt: Xmas Cookie Clicker Free Online Game

headings.text: How to Play Xmas Cookie Clicker?

controls: Use your mouse to control Xmas Cookie Clicker, as the name of the game suggests.
content.howToPlay: Click on the cookie man to create your own very first cookie. This is just the beginning!Every time you click, you will see earnings increase accordingly.Xmas Cookie Clicker has a wide range of badges, skins and cookie makers to unlock.Employ cookie makers according to your strategy. You can choose the helpers boosting your cookies per click, such as bonus click, multiple clicks, droid, industrial center, and many more. Or else, you can focus on autonomous cookie makers. And employ unmanned systems, click farm, and other ones we'd like you to explore yourself. You can see the cookie makers on the right side of the screen. You can buy them one by one or in bulk by clicking on the x1, x10, and x100 buttons on the top right.If you make a streak, your clicking power doubles up. Check out the pink bar on the left and keep the bar full for faster cookie production.When you unlock all the materials, click on the ascend button and start from zero but with ascension multipliers.
content.tips: As you progress through the game, you will see the weather also changes.Unlock all the weathers by producing a certain amount of cookies. Then you can select the desired weather on your screen. Rainy, sunny, and even star rain is possible.The same rules apply to the cookie man's skins. You can unlock new skins with hilarious costumes and hats. Our favorite is Baby Cookie. He seems extremely cute with his pacifier in his mouth.You can see golden cookies passing through your screen randomly. Catch those guys by clicking on them because it will give you lots of $$$.Watch an ad to double up the production for 60 seconds or earn extra income.At the bottom of your screen, you will see how many cookies you produce per second autonomously and your clicking power. This will give you a clue on which cookie makers to buy more, depending on your strategy.
content.developer: Xmas Cookie Clicker is created by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Home› ClickerXmas Cookie ClickerBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHo Ho Ho! It's the most wonderful time of the year! Start kneading the dough; everybody is waiting for their Christmas cookies. This is a job requiring speed. In Xmas Cookie Clicker, you will produce cute cookies with icing and Christmas-themed decorations on them.If you trust your clicking speed, strategize in a way to boost cookies per click. Otherwise, aim for an idle income by employing self-operating cookie producers. Click on the cookie once and see how this tiny cookie man will captivate you for hours!How to Play Xmas Cookie Clicker?Click on the cookie man to create your own very first cookie. This is just the beginning!Every time you click, you will see earnings increase accordingly.Xmas Cookie Clicker has a wide range of badges, skins and cookie makers to unlock.Employ cookie makers according to your strategy. You can choose the helpers boosting your cookies per click, such as bonus click, multiple clicks, droid, industrial center, and many more. Or else, you can focus on autonomous cookie makers. And employ unmanned systems, click farm, and other ones we'd like you to explore yourself. You can see the cookie makers on the right side of the screen. You can buy them one by one or in bulk by clicking on the x1, x10, and x100 buttons on the top right.If you make a streak, your clicking power doubles up. Check out the pink bar on the left and keep the bar full for faster cookie production.When you unlock all the materials, click on the ascend button and start from zero but with ascension multipliers.Tips and Other Game FeaturesAs you progress through the game, you will see the weather also changes.Unlock all the weathers by producing a certain amount of cookies. Then you can select the desired weather on your screen. Rainy, sunny, and even star rain is possible.The same rules apply to the cookie man's skins. You can unlock new skins with hilarious costumes and hats. Our favorite is Baby Cookie. He seems extremely cute with his pacifier in his mouth.You can see golden cookies passing through your screen randomly. Catch those guys by clicking on them because it will give you lots of $$$.Watch an ad to double up the production for 60 seconds or earn extra income.At the bottom of your screen, you will see how many cookies you produce per second autonomously and your clicking power. This will give you a clue on which cookie makers to buy more, depending on your strategy.DeveloperXmas Cookie Clicker is created by FreezeNova.ControlsUse your mouse to control Xmas Cookie Clicker, as the name of the game suggests.  What to Play Next?Fan of clicking and going from 0 to 100? We are sure you will love Capybara Clicker Pro. Dive into the land of lovely Capybaras and keep clicking for fun. Or else, see more of the clicker games and decide which one is your cup of tea. We'd love to hear from you if you have any wishes or suggestions. Tell us how far you could get in Xmas Cookie Clicker in the comment section down below!Embed URL:https://www.onlinegames.io/games/2023/construct/288/xmas-cookie-clicker/index.htmlThis article was updated on December 25, 20241 Player2DChristmasClickerCookingCuteEmbeddableFreeHTML5IdleKidsMouse
